code: import{DECREMENT_QTY,REMOVE_FROM_CART,ADD_TO_CART}from'../../actionTypes';export var addToCart=function addToCart(product,qty){return{type:ADD_TO_CART,payload:{product:product,qty:qty}};};export var removeFromCart=function removeFromCart(product_id){return{type:REMOVE_FROM_CART,product_id:product_id};};export var decrementQty=function decrementQty(productId){return{type:DECREMENT_QTY,productId:productId};};
